name: Tarrasque
description: The Tarrasque is a towering monstrosity, standing over 50 feet tall with a massive, armored body, claws capable of tearing through stone, and a maw large enough to swallow buildings whole. Its appearance is imposing and destructive, leaving devastation in its wake.
memorable: Considered one of the most powerful creatures, it regenerates health and is nearly impossible to kill, making it a true behemoth of destruction.
goals: Wreaking havoc on the landscape and opposing any adventurers who dare confront it.
relations: Might be related to other titanic creatures or ancient entities, often feared and avoided by adventurers.
environment: Spends most of its time in slumber beneath the earth, rarely active but ready to unleash chaos when disturbed.
strengths: Incredibly high Armor Class and hit points, significant regeneration, immunity to various damage types and conditions, devastating physical attacks.
weaknesses: Limited intelligence and social interaction capabilities, can only be temporarily suppressed by specific magic spells.
attacks: Multiattack capability includes a bite, claws, horns, and tail, each dealing devastating damage; has the option to swallow and incapacitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Breath: Exhales radiant energy in a 90-foot cone, causing massive damage to those caught within.
senses: Possesses blindsight with a range of 120 feet, which allows for easy detection of hidden opponents.
additional_information: Astounding Leap allows jumping abilities equal to its speed.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Reflective Carapace may reflect spells back at their caster.
Siege Monster ability deals double damage to structures.
test_queries: massive creature that inflicts double damage
